activities.name: Homeless Shelter Coordinator
activities.description: Organized meal service and life skills workshops
activities.impact: Served 1000+ meals, helped 15 people find stable housing

activities.name: Peer Counseling Program
activities.description: Provided emotional support to struggling classmates
activities.impact: Supported 25+ students through academic and personal challenges

core_values.description: Dedicating life to helping others in need

defining_moments.title: Helping Someone Find Housing
defining_moments.description: Supporting a homeless individual through housing application
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Witnessing transformation from despair to hope
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Small actions can create profound change

defining_moments.title: Transforming Despair into Hope
defining_moments.description: While helping a homeless individual secure housing, I witnessed a profound transformation from despair to hope. This experience taught me that small, dedicated actions can lead to significant changes in people's lives.

defining_moments.title: Organizing Life Skills Workshops
defining_moments.description: I coordinated life skills workshops at the shelter, empowering attendees with practical knowledge and confidence. This role highlighted the importance of education in fostering independence and self-sufficiency.

defining_moments.title: Meal Service: More Than Food
defining_moments.description: Serving meals at the shelter, I learned that providing food was just the beginning; the real impact came from the conversations and connections formed. These interactions deepened my understanding of community and compassion.
